name: Space Spider Survival
description:
Space Spider Survival

Controls

w = up

a = left

s = down

d = right

q = previous weapon

e = next weapon

left shift = sprint

mouse = aim

left click = shoot

Kill the evil Space Spiders.

Protect the civilians.

Last as long as you can.

You never win at Space Spider Survival.

You just do a little better each time.
